name: photo-of-the-day-september-10-2008
title: Photo Of The Day: September 10, 2008
author: Christy Frink
contentEncoded:
Even though we’re Music City, big-name locals seem to steer clear of their hometown when it comes to charting out major tours (or maybe we’re just not paying attention.) But back in July, Keith Urban opened for Kenny Chesney’s Poets and Pirates Tour at LP Field just two days before he and Nicole welcomed Sunday Rose Kidman Urban into the world. This well-composed shot by gjohnsonxx captured a piece of the action in one of the hottest shows of Nashville’s summer.

Photo Of The Day will be a recurring feature for Nashvillest as long you keep giving us stuff to post. Don’t worry- We’ll give you props. Just add them to the pool or tag them with “Nashvillest” if you’re feeling lazy.
